Javier and his wife make their living breeding and selling animals. They have done this work for five years. Their business is located in the back of their home. Javier has requested a loan of 1,000 Peruvian soles to purchase feed for fattening their animals so that they can sell them at better prices.

loans.use: to purchase feed for his animals.

loans.name: Rosa Haydee

texts.es:
Rosa, se ha decidido por solicitar un nuevo crédito para adquirir mercadería por mayor para la tienda comprara golosinas, arroz, frijol, bebidas, pastas, sal, azúcar, así como otro tipo  de mercadería que le ayude a dar una mejor atención.
El crédito anterior le permitió adquirir productos necesarios responder a las necesidad es de sus clientes, sus ventas aumentaron y la nueva situación económica le permite ofrecer a su familia un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa has decided to apply for a new loan to purchase wholesale merchandise for her store such as candy, rice, beans, beverages, pasta, salt, sugar, and other goods to help her give her improve her service to her customers.
The previous loan enabled her to acquire the products she needed to respond to her customer's needs. Her sales increased and her new economic situation allows her to offer her family a better lifestyle.

loans.use: to purchase products for her store such as candy, rice, beans, beverages, and more.

loans.name: Dambe Group

texts.fr:
Dambé est un regroupement de femmes du quartier Darsalam I qui  vivent dans de grandes familles traditionnelles avec leurs maris, enfants et autres parents. Elles ont en moyenne 33 ans, sont mariées et ont au moins 4 enfants.
Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce d’articles divers tels que, des condiments, Bois de chauffe et divers. Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur sixième prêt de groupe. 
Djelika  debout en deuxième position de la gauche vers la droite  compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des chargements de bois de chauffage. Elle se procure de ces bois en brousse et dans les villages environnant de Koutiala. Elle les vend à la maison à une clientèle diverse. 
Tandis que les autres membres du groupe Dambé comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 100 000CFA  chacune au  cours de ce cycle Mme Djelika compte réaliser  120 000FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses personnel et augmenter son fonds de commerce.
texts.en:
Dambé is a group of women from the Darsalam I district. These women live in traditional extended families with their husband, children and other family members. On the average, they are 33 years old, married, with at least four children.
The group members sell various merchandise, for example, condiments, firewood etc. In order to expand their businesses, the group members have decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program. They are on their sixth group loan.

Djelika, the second one standing from left to right in the photo, plans to use her loan to buy some truckloads of firewood. She gets her firewood in the bushland and in villages near Koutiala. She sells out of her house to a mixed clientele.
While other members of the Dambé group plan to earn an average monthly revenue of 100,000 West African francs during this loan cycle, Mrs. Djelika plans to earn 120,000 francs.  In addition to  repaying their loan, the group members will use part of the revenue for personal expenses and add the rest to their working capital.

loans.use: to buy firewood.

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
Esterlita, age 68, is from Panalsalan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental, Mindanao; Philippines. She is married with 12 children.

Esterlita is fond of Nipa weaving as Nipa is commonly used as roofing material for most Filipino native houses. Her fondness for Nipa weaving became a business which is popular not only in their barangay but also in neighboring towns as well. This business opportunity helps her to earn a living.

In 2006, Esterlita applied for membership with PMPC because of the many benefits. She requests 10,000 PHP to buy sacks of palay for rice production and resale.  The income from her Nipa weaving and rice production will pay-off to the loan. 

Through this, she hopes to increase her income to suffice the needs of her big family. She wants nothing more than to have a decent and comfortable life with her family. 

This is her 3rd loan with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy sacks of palay for rice production.

loans.name: Berlita

texts.en:
Berlita is 48 years old and a resident of Plaridel, Misamis Occidental, Mindanao: Philippines. She is married and has two children. Berlita owns a single-seater motor cab for transporting passengers downtown. It is operated by her husband and it's the way they are earning a living.

She has been a member of PMPC for seven years and enjoys the privilege of being a member of the Cooperative. Now, she is applying for a loan of PHP 14,900 to pay for school tuition fees for her daughter who is in college. And the income from her motor cab every week will be used to pay back the loan she requested from the Coop.

Berlita deeply wishes to maintain her membership in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: to pay for school tuition fees

loans.name: Katheryn

texts.es: Katheryn es una joven con 26 años de edad, soltera y madre de una niña de tres años. Vive con sus padres. Es madre soltera, una mujer con muchos deseos de superación, trabajadora y con visión empresarial. Estudia porque quiere superarse para tener un futuro mejor ella y su familia. Desde hace varios años se dedica a su actividad debido a que no cuenta con el apoyo del padre de su hija. Se dedica a las ventas por catálogo de productos amway y también ropa, le va muy bien, gracias al buen trato y comodidad que le brinda a sus clientes. Ahora quiere invertir en su mayoría en la ropa interior y pantalones largos de mezclilla para dama, debido a que tiene buen mercado para su venta. Ésto con el fin de generar más ingresos para poder salir adelante y asi ayudarse en sus estudios universitarios.
texts.en:
Katheryn is a young woman who is 26 years of age. She is single and the mother of a three-year-old daughter. Katheryn lives with her parents. In addition to being a single mother, Katheryn is a woman who is hardworking, has an entrepreneurial vision, and possesses the drive to succeed. She is also studying to improve herself so that she and her family can have a better future.

Katheryn has managed her business for several years since she does not receive support from the father of her daughter. She sells Amway products and clothing through catalogs, and is doing very well as a result of the good service and convenience she provides to her customers.

Now she wants to invest mostly in undergarments and plus-size women's jeans since there is a good market for these items. In the end, Katheryn hopes to generate more income so that she can get ahead and continue with her university studies.

loans.use: to buy undergarments and women's jeans to sell.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 43 years old, married with 3 children, and lives at Plaridel, Misamis Occidental, Mindanao: Philippines. 

She earns a living raising pigs in her backyard and her husband is a tricycle driver. Raising pigs is a good business because of the  earnings and she also enjoys doing it.

Maria is in her 3rd year with PMPC. She requests a loan of 14,900PHP for Cocoland redemption. Their family income will repay the loan she requested from the Coop. She really hopes & prays that her business would grow and benefit her family and supplement her husband's income. Someday, she wants to build a concrete pig cage to provide more sanitary conditions.

loans.use: to buy Cocoland Redemption.

loans.name: Senge-Ravdan

texts.en:
Senge-Ravdan is 20 years old and lives with his wife in a rental apartment in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

Before he married, he lived with his parents who have run a grocery store for a long time. He provides a taxi service to local people. Due to a severe eye disease, he stopped studying at the  university and traveled to India for eye surgery. He plans to return to the university after working for a few years. 

His wife is currently unemployed and requests a loan of 2,500,000 MNT to  rent a stall and purchase clothes in large quantity. His wife doesn't want to stay at home doing nothing so she decided to start this business. If the clothes sales business is successful, it will help his future family. 

The borrower is a young hardworking individual who cares deeply for his beloved ones.

loans.use: to start a clothing business.

loans.name: Diego

texts.en:
Diego previously accessed an 30,000 PHP loan that he utilized to purchase  fabric, cloth, thread, needles and other materials needed in his business. His earnings were a big help for personal, house hold, and business expenditures.
 
He would like to apply for another 40,000 PHP loan  to buy fabric, cloth, thread, needles and other materials. His profits from his business will definitely help him to meet his daily needs. He looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in his heart. 

Diego hopes to be more successful in business and dreams of becoming rich. He meets weekly with his co-fellowship members to share stories of his life and business.  He can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God that he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, cloth, thread, needles and other materials needed in his business.

loans.name: Oyungerel

texts.en:
Oyungerel is 51 years old and lives with her daughter and niece in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. 

Her daughter established a construction company and Oyungerel has been employed there as a bookkeeper for seven months.  She also worked as a manager since 2009 and during the evenings, offered a taxi service to local people. 

She requests a loan of 2,200,000 MNT to buy building materials such as electrical connectors, cement and waterproofing items for her daughter's company. She wants to help her daughter to succeed in business and raise her child with love. 

The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Leap

texts.en:
Leap is 40 years old and from a rural village in Kampong Thom province. She is married to a humble man, and together they are blessed with four children who are of various ages. 

She is a farmer who has been cultivating rice to earn a living for almost 20 years. The business returns her a decent income which she commonly uses for the family’s daily meal. The majority of their income is from her husband who works as a construction laborer.

At this time, Leap is taking a loan in the amount of $560 to build a household latrine for the sake of her family members as she doesn’t have a proper latrine. This loan will allow her to cover the overall costs of the construction. 

Thanks to the water loan program and a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Leap is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions to safeguard the health of her family and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a household latrine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her tuition fee.

loans.name: Salvador Manuel

texts.es:
Salvador, solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar lociones, cosméticos, cremas, detergentes, desinfectantes, etc., ya que son productos que sus clientes demandan y para mantener su fidelidad ofrecerá un inventario  muy surtido.
El capital anterior le ayudo a mejorar la variedad de productos que tenia, tuvo buenas ventas, sus ganancias son mejores, ha cancelado puntualmente sus cuotas y su familia se encuentra en optimas condiciones.
texts.en:
Salvador is requesting a new loan in order to purchase lotions, cosmetics, creams, detergents, disinfectants etc, as those are the products his customers ask for.  In order to keep their business, Salvador will offer a well-stocked inventory. 
The previous capital helped him to improve the variety of products that he had on hand.  As a result, Salvador had good sales, his profits are better and he has punctually repaid his loan.  Salvador's family is also in ideal conditions.

loans.use: to purchase lotions, cosmetics, creams, detergents, disinfectants etc.

loans.name: Asian

texts.en:
Asian is a 47-year-old house wife who lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of 1-child. 

Her husband owns an alu chat stall in the market which is the only source of income for the family. He sells fresh alu chat (a food item made from potatoes) in his stall. He is interested in offering more of this product to his customers  to increase his net income and savings. This is difficult, due to insufficient funds. Therefore, Asian requests a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband purchase a variety of alu chat making materials from the market and sell at a profitable price. 

With the profit, her husband will expand his business. Asian is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy basic ingredients for making more alu chaat (a food item made from potatoes).

loans.name: Un

texts.en:
Un, age 61, is a married man with five children who range in age from 22 to 38 years old. He describes himself as a small person who operates a farming business as the major source of his income. His wife and children are a great support for the maintenance of the rice fields. Un has been involved in this business for almost 30 years. The biggest business challenges for him are the lack of capital and the change of weather.

This will be his first loan. He will use it to provide his family with better sanitation practices. He will build a hygienic latrine for the sake of his family members. This loan will allow him to cover the overall costs of the construction. Thanks to the water loan program with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Un is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions to safeguard the health of his family and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine for the sake of his family members.

loans.name: Stephen Lord

texts.en:
Stephen Lord is 29 years old and has only one child. Being a responsible father, he aims to improve the family's living standards and to give them a better life. 

He buys and resells ice cream within his town. To make his goal attainable, he is asking for a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy more stock of ice cream, soft drinks, and snack foods to sell.

Stephen Lord believes that this financial assistance will enable him to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy more ice cream, soft drinks, and snack foods to sell.

loans.name: Altynay

texts.en:
Altynay is a student of the American University of Central Asia (AUCA), department of European Studies and here is her story:

"I am interested in foreign languages. My goals are to master foreign languages, be able to communicate with the foreign people, travel and to get a well-paying future job. When you know foreign languages well, you can read their literature in origin, learn that people’s culture, traditions, will be able to be in their country and observe their life with your own eyes. At school I learned English as a foreign language, which helped me to be enrolled at AUCA. Now I take French and German and wish to visit European countries and get MBA in one of them. One of the people who promotes my idea is my brother. He himself studies at AUCA and contended with its education and international atmosphere. He has a chance to choose the classes to take, meet students from different countries, and take part in extracurricular activities at the University. From my point of view, AUCA is doing everything for the convenience of students, the other advantages are computers with Internet access, a laboratory which is fully equipped with multimedia equipment, library, electronic catalog and electronic database, availability of Cambridge and Oxford Journals, Oxford reference books and etc. Degrees awarded by AUCA are valid throughout the world. The university attracts only the best professors from all over the world who really love to work with students. I feel I am a part of AUCA and want to be in the future. As I said my brother also studies here, so it’s too hard for my parents to pay for both of us. I am in a need of KIVA loan and hope to get it."

loans.use: to pay for higher education.

loans.name: Ester

texts.en:
Ester is a 63-year-old married resident of Taguig, Philippines. Her husband, Virgilio, is a driver. They manage their household while operating the business. She works hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Ester operates a house rental business. It is rented on a monthly basis. She also sells frozen and processed foods for additional income. She is also a jeepney (public transportation) operator to earn additional income. She earns a minimum of 20,000 Philippine Pesos (PHP) in sales every month.

To help her continue to operate her business, she requests 13,000 PHP. She will use the loan to repair her rental property. 

Ester dreams of expanding her business and hopes to provide a good life for her family. She meets weekly with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work. She draws strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for the repair and maintenance of her rental property.

loans.name: Lkhagvaragchaa

texts.en:
Lkhagvaragchaa is 45 years old and lives with his family in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. 

He has been selling casual clothes since 2012 by renting a stall at a trade center. He imports his goods from Europe, and sales are great because European goods are normally of high quality. 

Lkhagvaragchaa is requesting a loan of 6,700,000 MNT to buy an electric car for transporting his goods. The advantage of an electric car is that it contributes to cleaner air in cities because it produces no harmful pollution such as particulates (soot), volatile organic compounds, hydrocarbons, carbon monoxide, ozone, lead, and various oxides of nitrogen.

loans.use: to buy an electric car

loans.name: Sonia Yanira

texts.es:
Sonia, es madre soltera, vive en casa familiar junto a su hijo, anteriormente vendía tortillas, actualmente venden granos básicos y leña por mayor y al detalle, es algo que aprendió de su mamá, tiene un año realizando esta actividad.
Invertirá el capital en la compra de maíz, frijol y leña, le dará la pauta para fortalecer su negocio, tener producto de calidad para ofrecer a sus clientes, espera mejorar la economía familiar para cancelar puntualmente sus cuotas.
Su aspiración es tener un negocio con más productos y poder vender en un puesto dentro del mercado municipal.
texts.en:
Sonia is a single mother.  She lives in a cozy house with her son.  She previously sold tortillas, but now she sells wholesale and retail basic grains and firewood.  Sonia learned the trade from her mother and has been working in the business for one year. 
Sonia will invest the capital in the purchase of corn, beans and firewood.  It will give her a baseline from which to strengthen her business, to have quality products to sell to her customers.  She hopes to improve her family's financial situation and to punctually repay her loan. 
Sonia's aspiration is to have a business that offers more products and to be able to sell from a sales stall in the municipal market.

loans.use: to purchase corn, beans and firewood.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en: Judith is a 34-year-old married woman. She has four children with ages ranging from three to eight years old. She describes herself to be determined. She operates a tailoring business where she makes clothes. Her business is located in an urban area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be changes in the prices of tailoring materials. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy stock of threads, fabric and other tailoring materials. Her business goal is to be supplying school uniforms to schools within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will expand her business. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy more stock of threads, fabric and other tailoring materials

loans.name: Sophea

texts.en:
Sophea is a 39-year-old man from Angsnoul district, Kandal province. He is married and has four children. To satisfy his family’s living needs, Sophea operates a business providing construction services to people living in the province and around the city. Sophea is well-known for his responsibilities, honesty, and hard work. They hire him when they need to build or repair a house or other kinds of low-rise buildings. From his current business, he is able to make approximately USD 5.60 per day.

Now Sophea has applied for a loan, amounting to USD 1,000, to build a hygienic latrine and to buy its necessities. He hopes that the latrine construction will be done for the sake of his family members. Thanks to the water loan program, with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Sophea is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of his family, and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a hygienic latrine and to buy its necessities.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda, 60 years old, lives in Bato, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental, Mindanao, Philippines. She was gifted with three children.

Erlinda is used to planting vegetables and other varieties of agricultural commodities, such as root crops. In a couple of weeks, she will then harvest and sell them to the market. 

In need of additional working capital, Erlinda decided to join Paglaum Cooperative. She has received several loans already, and recently requested PHP 14,900 for cocoland (land planted with coconuts) redemption, from which she could use the land for planting any agricultural commodity to earn more income.

Being a MIGS member (Member in Good Standing) of the cooperative, she has been able to manage her income. She is able to provide for the daily needs of her family. Erlinda is very thankful, because if it were not for Paglaum, she might not have any savings at all nor be guided properly in her finances. 

She hopes to own a four-wheeled vehicle someday to use for delivering her own agricultural products in all nearby towns.

loans.use: to pay for cocoland redemption.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria is a 40-year-old married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 10 to 19 years old. She describes herself to be helpful. She operates a beauty salon where she offers hair dressing services. She has been involved in this business for 20 years. Her primary customers are women. She describes her biggest business challenges to be the failure of machinery and power and water shortages. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy stock of hair weaves and beauty products to boost her business. Her business goal is to start other businesses within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will have more salons in other towns. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy hair weaves and beauty products

loans.name: Xexac Group

texts.es:
Ana María (en el centro de la  fotografía) es una señorita de 32 años de edad, soltera, tiene  dos hijos, ella vive junto a su familia en Nahualá, Sololá.
Ella es una joven con muchas ganas de superarse y salir adelante, se dedica a la producción y venta de banano, esto bonita actividad lo realiza en la comunidad donde vive; esta actividad la heredó de sus padres, quienes se dedicaban a lo mismo y fue asi como le transfirieron todo el conocimiento y experiencia. Esta labor le genera a ella los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hermosa familia. Ella comenta que le gusta esta actividad porque es honesta y con ella le sirve a su comunidad. Tiene más de 17 años de experiencia en esta actividad.
Con el objetivo de contribuir a su comunidad ella decidió organizar un grupo para ayudarse mutuamente con su compañeras y asi mejorar sus niveles de vida. Utilizará el préstamo para la compra de insumos (fertilizante y pago de mano de obra) para mantenimiento de las  plantaciones de banano.
Ana María sueña con producir más banano  e incrementar sus ingresos y asi brindarle educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ana María (in the centre of the photo) is 32 years old, single, and has two children. She lives with her family in Nahualá, Sololá.

Ana María is a young woman with a great desire to get ahead in life. She earns her living growing and selling banana plants in the community where she lives. She inherited this business from her parents who passed on all their knowledge and experience to her. The money she earns provides Ana María with the income she needs to support her beautiful family. She enjoys the work because it is honest and benefits her community. She now has more than 17 years experience in this job.

Because she wanted to contribute to her community, Ana María decided to organize a group so they could help each other and improve their standard of living. She will use the loan money to buy supplies such as fertilizer and pay for labour to maintain her banana crops.

Ana María’s dreams are to produce more banana plants, increase her income, and provide her children with a good education.

loans.use: buy supplies such as fertilizer and pay for labour

loans.name: Zia-Ul-Mohsin Abid

texts.en:
Zia-ul-Mohsin is a 34-year-old energetic young man living with his family in the area of Multan, Pakistan. He has been running a cosmetics store for 10 years, generating income for his family. He sells beauty products such as shampoo, lotions, creams, artificial jewelry, nail polish and ladies under garments. Nowadays, demand for export quality products has increased but due to their unavailability, he has to refuse his customers. He does not have enough savings to invest further in his business. In fact, his major income is spent on household expenses and his father’s medical expense. His father is a retired government servant and suffers an illness. He has to arrange marriage ceremonies and dowries for his three unmarried sisters as well.

Therefore, Zia-ul-Mohsin requested a loan for his business to buy export quality cosmetic products.  He hopes that now he can grow his business, generate more income and arrange dowries for his sisters. Zia-ul-Mohsin thanks Kiva and their field partner for this honorable support.

loans.use: To buy export quality beauty products.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en: Benard is a 40-year-old married man. He has three children with ages ranging from 10 years to 17 years. He operates a transportation business where he transports customers using his taxi. He has been involved in this business for 10 years. His business is located in an urban area and his primary customers are of all types. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy spare parts to service his taxi. He hopes that in the future, he will start a car hiring service and tours company. This is his second loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to service his taxi

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a married woman. She has two children who are four and six years old. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a green grocery where she sells tomatoes, bananas and other vegetables. She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located in a market area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be a lack of funds. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of tomatoes. Her business goal is to be a supplier of tomatoes within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will buy a transport vehicle. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy more stock of tomatoes

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: La señora Rosa es del departamento de Cochabamba, desde hace varios años está separada del padre de sus tres hijos, actualmente dos de ellos aun son dependientes económicamente, los ayuda en su educación y cubre todos sus gastos; ella estudio hasta nivel inicial ya que sus padres eran de escasos recursos económicos y esto le impidió seguir estudiando, desde muy joven se dedicó al comercio de comida para poder ayudar a su familia, cuando ella se independizó para vivir con el padre de sus hijos dejo su actividad económica y se dedicó a atenderlos pero cuando se quedó sola se vio obligada a trabajar y continuo con el comercio de comida rápida e inicio con el comercio de dulces, para esta última actividad cuenta con una pequeña caseta en el mercado, para poder tener más ingresos necesita un crédito para capital de operación y comprar productos para abastecer su caseta, de esta forma incrementara sus ventas y por consiguiente también aumentara sus ingresos para proporcionarle a sus hijos mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Sra. Rosa is from the department of Cochabamba. For several years now she has been separated from the father of her three children. Two of them are still dependent on her. She helps them with education costs and with all other expenses.

Rosa has very little education as her parents were poor so she wasn’t able to continue studying. Ever since she was very young she has had a food business so she could help her family. When she left home to live with the father of her children, she stopped working so she could look after the children. However, when she was on her own again, she had to work so started her fast food business again. She also started selling candy from a small booth in the market.

Rosa is seeking a loan to buy products for the booth and increase her income. She will make more sales and earn more money to provide her children with better living conditions.

loans.use: buy products for her candy stall

loans.name: Celestine

texts.en: Celestine is a 30-year-old married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 2 to 10 years old. She describes herself to be philanthropic. She operates a retail shop where she sells household items. She also sells paraffin outside the shop. She has been involved in this business for six years. Her business is located in a rural area and her primary customers are local residents. She will use the KES 40,000 loan to add more stock of paraffin. Her business goal is to expand within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be prosperous. This is her third loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy more stock of paraffin

loans.name: Shabnam

texts.en:
Shabnam is a 35-year-old woman who lives with her spouse in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

Her hometown is very populated area.  People mostly like to chew betel leaves.  So, a few years ago her husband decided to open a paan shop to offer kinds of betel leaves to the people. He offers different kinds of betel leaves such as sweet paan, which consists of a mixture of chopped or coarsely ground areca nuts, mint, coconut, fruit preserves, gulkand (rose petal preserves) and various spices and tobacco paan, which consists of powdered tobacco. 

He is an expert with preparing paan because he has been running this shop for many years and lots of customers like to take betel leaves which are prepared by him. To cope with the increasing demand he wants keep more stock of ingredients so that he can maximize his income. 

Therefore, Shabnam requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can buy betel leaves, chopped areca nuts, tobacco, etc. to sell.

loans.use: To help her husband buy betel leaves, chopped areca nuts, tobacco, etc. to sell at a paan shop

loans.name: Fehmida's Group

texts.en:
Fehmida is a 32-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of two children. 

Fehmida's husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. For many days, his rickshaw has not been working properly and he has been unable to generate any income. He wants to repair the rickshaw as soon as possible. However, due to a lack of money, he finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairs. Therefore Fehmida has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing his rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Fehmida is very thankful to Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for repairs to her husband's rickshaw

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is a 31-year-old mother of two. She and her husband have been engaged in rice farming for ten years. 

In order to obtain better yields this next crop season, Rosemarie is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase fertilizers and insecticides. She hopes that these inputs will ensure the health and growth of her crops. She will thereby improve her financial status and provide her family with a more comfortable lifestyle.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and insecticides for  her farm

loans.name: Saleema

texts.en:
Saleema is 45 years old and lives with her spouse and two children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 
Her husband has been running a small vegetable shop for many years and earns a reasonable income. As time passes and inflation increases, the sources of income have not increased. To increase income he wants his enterprise to progress. To purchase more vegetables, he does not have sufficient cash in hand. He tried to borrow money from his friends and relatives but nobody helped him. 
Therefore, Saleema requested a loan for her husband so that he would be able to buy additional vegetables to sell. 
Saleema thanks Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy additional vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en: Monicah is a 30-year-old married woman with three children. She describes herself as ambitious. She operates a retail business where she sells cereals to primarily local customers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of funds to buy more stock . She will use the KES 70,000 loan to buy more stock of cereals. Her business goal is to have a very competitive business within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will create employment. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for her children and invest in another new business.

loans.use: to add stocks of cereals for resale.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leoida 42 years old, married and had five children.

She has been engaged in selling mobile auto-loadmax for five years. 

With her dedication to increasing her sales, she is applying for a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase a higher amount of load for mobile phones. 

In the future, Leonida hopes that she will build a sari-sari business so that she can meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase load for her mobile auto-loadmax business.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: La señora Delia tiene 43 años, actualmente está casada y tiene una hija de 19 años, quien es fruto de su matrimonio anterior, ya que la cliente es divorciada; hace tiempo se fue a España a trabajar por más de 6 años para ofrecerle un mejor nivel de vida a su hija, actualmente se siente feliz de poder estar con su familia ya que por trabajo abandono a su hija por mucho tiempo; su actividad económica es la producción de leche cruda y los tres trabajan en dicha actividad. Como no tiene muchos recursos económicos solicita un crédito para la compra de forraje, como incremento la cantidad de ganado lechero de manera considerable necesita forraje en grandes cantidades, esto le beneficiara para incrementar sus ingresos, crecer en su actividad y ayudar a su hija para que concluya su carrera profesional.
texts.en: Delia is 43 years old. She is currently married and has a 19-year-old daughter from a previous marriage. Recently she went to Spain to work for over 6 years to provide her daughter with a better standard of living. Now she is happy to be with her family since she was away from her daughter for a long time because of work. Her business is the production of raw milk, and her husband and daughter work alongside her. As she does not have many economic resources, she is requesting a loan for the purchase of feed. She needs large quantities of feed as the number of dairy cattle increased considerably. This will benefit her by increasing her revenue, growing her business, and helping her daughter complete her professional career.

loans.use: to buy feed for cattle

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es:
Luis es un señor  preocupado por el bienestar de su familia, es casado, no tiene hijos a su cargo, labora en un centro de salud de la zona donde habita, desempeñándose en el área de epidemiologia con 27 años de laborar para dicho ministerio de salud.
Este señor tiene una necesidad de construir un cuarto, por tal razón visito la oficina de ceprodel para solicitar financiamiento el que  utilizara en la compra de materiales de construcción como:  cemento, arena, piedrín, zinc, perlines y bloques siendo este en crédito numero 5 los cuales le han permitido realizar varias mejoras en la vivienda, teniendo mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Luis is a man concerned for the well-being of his family. He is married and has no children under his responsibility. He is employed in a health center in the area where he lives, working in the area of epidemiology, and has been working for the Ministry of Health for 27 years.

This gentleman has a need to build a room, and for this reason visited the Ceprodel office to request a loan, which he will use to purchase construction materials such as: cement, sand, gravel, sheet metal roofing, purlins and cement blocks. This is his fifth loan, and these have allowed him to carry out various improvements to his home and to have better living conditions.

loans.use: To buy construction materials such as: cement, sand, gravel, sheet metal roofing, purlins and cement blocks.

loans.name: Saidja'far

texts.ru: Саидчаъфару 30 лет он уроженец района Хамадони. Саидчаъфар женат и отец двоих детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Она следит за порядком дома за детьми и за родителями Саидчаъфара. Родители Саидчаъфара пенсионеры. Саидчаъфар кормит свою семью за счет то, что занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Он выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры. Саидчаъфар решил начать новую деятельность в сфере животноводства. Новый бизнес принесет в семью больше дохода, что поможет покрыть растущие доходы семьи. Саидчаъфар просит кредит, чтобы купить телят. Помогите ему начать бизнес. Он нуждается в вашей поддержке.
texts.en: Saidja'far is 30 years old and he is a native of the Hamedan region.  He is married and a father of two children.  His wife is a homemaker; she looks after their children and Saidja'far's parents at home.  Saidja'far's parents are pensioners, and he provides for his family with the income he earns from farming and growing crops.  He has decided to start a new trade in raising animals.  This new business will bring in a larger income for his family and it will help cover his family's increasing expenses.  Saidja'far is asking for a loan to buy calves.  Help him start his new business - he needs your support.

loans.use: to buy animals to start his own business so he can give his family new financial opportunities.

loans.name: Nicolás Bayardo

texts.es: El señor Nicolás es Casado, de profesión Productor Agropecuario ejerce las dos actividades es un señor emprendedor, con 3 hijos pero ya no a su  cargo, a los que les enseño a trabajar de manera Honrada, el señor Nicolás tiene una necesidad de seguir mejorando las condiciones pecuaria para tener un mejor desempeño productivo, por tal razón visito a ceprodel para ser beneficiado con un crédito y lograr el objetivo percibido, ya que este sería utilizado   en limpia y reparación de cerca de su finca.
texts.en:
Nicolás farms and raises livestock. He does both activities and is an enterprising man. He is married with three children, but they are no longer under his responsibility. He taught them what honest work is. 

Nicolás needs to continue improving his conditions for raising livestock so that he can improve his productivity. For this reason he came to the Ceprodel office to be granted a loan and achieve this objective, as this will be used to do clearing and fence repair on his farm.

loans.use: To do clearing and fence repair.

loans.name: Juana Del Rosario

texts.es: La señora Juana se preocupa por la humanidad, ya que por vocación de servirles a los demás  se decidió estudiar auxiliar de enfermería, de la cual tiene 37 años de ejercer tan noble labor, trabaja en un centro de salud de la zona donde habita. Actualmente está solicitando un pequeño financiamiento para mejorar su vivienda  como es el cambio de piso, ventanas, letrina y rancho,  el que utilizara en la compra de materiales de construcción tales como cemento, arena, piedrín, zinc, palma, madera, tablas y pago de mano de obra, de esa manera mejorar las condiciones de vida, ya que con mucho esfuerzos ha venido realizando dichas mejoras apoyada con los financiamientos , por lo tanto le agradece a ceprodel por el apoyo oportuno para realizar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Juana is concerned about humanity so she decided to study the vocation  of nursing assistant as a way to serve others and she has 37 years of practicing this noble work. She works in a health center in the area where she lives.

She is currently applying for a small loan in order to improve her home by changing the floor, windows, toilet, and dining area and she will buy construction materials such as cement, sand, gravel, zinc, palms, wood, floorboards, and pay for labor, so that she can improve her living conditions as she has been through a lot of struggles and the financing will help and so she is grateful to Ceprodel for the timely support to help her reach her dreams.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement, sand, gravel, zinc, palm, wood, floorboards, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Winie

texts.en: Winie is a diligent mother and wife who is engaged in running a sari-sari (variety) store business.  She is 32 years old and has only one child.  Winie aims to become successful and financially stable in order to have a better future.  Her eagerness to strengthen her business pushes her to request a loan of 10,000 PHP in order to buy more groceries to stock and sell.  She is hoping that her loan request will be granted so that she can further develop her variety store business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to stock and to sell.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
This is Letecia, resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines.  She is married to Lorito, an employee.  Together with her husband, she manages the household while operating the business.  At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.  

Letecia operates a food stall.  In the Philippines, the whole working community and most families only eat home-cooked meals during evenings when all of the family members are at home to take part in the meal. This is not only a common family tradition but also a matter of convenience and frugal living. It is considered a waste of money and time to use cooking gas and food for one to two persons when buying cooked rice and viands (prepared meals) cost less than raw food. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of 500 PHP in sales every day.

To help her continue operating her business, she is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more products including various meats, rice, vegetables, condiments, seasonings and frozen food products. 

Letecia dreams to expand her business and hopes to improve her standard of living.  She meets with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and also to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners and/or clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis.  A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners.  The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for raw ingredients like rice, pork, chicken and vegetables needed in her business.

loans.name: David Ruben

texts.es: El señor David de 22 años de edad, vive en el domicilio de sus padres y no tiene hijos dependientes, realiza su trabajo de chapería y soldadura a diario lo que le sirve para poder sustentarse y cubrir sus gastos, cuenta con amplia experiencia ya que viene desarrollando esa actividad desde hace años y tiene mucha demanda, pero como lo que gana no es suficiente, además de su actividad principal, sale a trabajar con su taxi por las madrugadas y en las noches con el deseo de poder tener mejores condiciones de vida y así poder también abrir su propio taller de soldadura y chapería que le ayuden a crecer tanto en lo personal como en lo profesional, ahora solicita un crédito para comprar un nuevo motor para su vagoneta con el objetivo de seguir trabajando de manera óptima y tener mayores ingresos para mejorar las condiciones en las que vive.
texts.en: David is 22 years old. He lives in his parents’ home and does not have any children dependent on him. He works as a car-body repairer and welder, which allows him to support himself and cover his expenses. He has a lot of experience since he has been doing this for years and he is in great demand, but what he earns is not enough. Besides his main job, he works as a taxi driver in the early hours of the morning and at night with the desire of being able to have better living conditions and open his own car-body repair workshop so he can grow both personally and professionally. He is now requesting a loan in order to purchase a new motor for his light truck with the goal of continuing to work optimally and have better earnings so he can improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a new motor for his vehicle

loans.name: Leydis María

texts.es:
Leydis es una señora, casada, con 2 hijos a su cargo a los que les brinda su apoyo para  su desarrollo.
Esta se desempeña como maestra de educación secundaria con 8 años de laborar.
Actualmente Leydis se presento a la oficina de ceprodel para solicitar un financiamiento, ya que tiene a su hija enferma de los riñones, ya que dicho  financiamiento lo utilizara  en el pago de consultas médicas y pago de tratamientos para dicha enfermedad.
Ya que tiene un alto costo  y su salario es muy bajo para cubrir esta urgencia que se le está presentando. Agradeciéndole a Ceprodel que le ha ayudado a resolver sus problemas cuando más lo necesita, ya que con este crédito es el numero 2 y se siente muy agradecida con nuestra institución por el apoyo oportuno que le ha brindado.
texts.en:
Leydis is a married woman with two children in her care, whose development she supports.

She has worked as a secondary school teacher for eight years.

Leydis approached CEPRODEL to request a loan because she has a daughter with kidney disease. She will use this loan to pay for medical consultations and treatments for said illness, since they are expensive and her salary is too low to cover the medical expenses. She is grateful to CEPRODEL as they have helped her to resolve her problems when she most needed it. This loan is her second with the institution and she feels very grateful to the institution for the support they have given her.

loans.use: to pay for medical expenses and treatment for her daughter's kidneys.

loans.name: Eley Yamilett

texts.es:
La señora Eley,  casada con dos hijos a los que les brinda su apoyo para su desarrollo, trabaja como conserje en un centro de salud  en el municipio con 9 años de laborar.
Eley tiene la necesidad de cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que se encuentra en mal estado, por tal motivo se acerco a la oficina de ceprodel para solicitar un financiamiento, ya que con este será el sexto financiamiento y de esta manera ha ido mejorando su vivienda y dándole mejores condiciones de vida a su familia. Dicho financiamiento lo utilizaría en la compra de materiales de construcción tales como: zinc corrugado, zinc liso, perlines, golosos y pago de mano de obra.
texts.en:
Eley, married with two children whom she supports, has worked as a caretaker in a health centre in the municipality for nine years.

Eley needs to change the roof of her home since it is in a bad state; for this reason she approached CEPRODEL in order to request financing. This will be her sixth loan and through these loans she has been improving her home and giving her family better living conditions. She would use this loan to purchase building materials, such as corrugated iron, plain metal sheets, purlins, and screws, as well as to pay for labour.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies, such as corrugated iron, plain metal sheets, purlins, and screws, and to pay for labour

loans.name: Luz  Marina

texts.es:
Luz es una señora, soltera con ningún hijo a su cargo, se desempeña como auxiliar de estadística, con 24 años de laborar.
Esta señora  se presento a la oficina de ceprodel para solicitar un financiamiento el que lo utilizara  para gastos personales  como es el pago de tarjetas de créditos en un banco y de esta manera unificar deudas y quedarse trabajando solo con ceprodel.
Agradeciendle a ceprodel por el apoyo opirtuno que le a brindado cuando mas lo ha necesitado y de esta manera ha mejorado sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Luz is a single woman with no children in her care. She has worked as an assistant statistician for 24 years.

She approached CEPRODEL to request a loan, which she will use for personal expenses, such as paying off credit cards so she can consolidate debts and stay working with only CEPRODEL.

She is grateful to CEPRODEL for the support they have given her when she most needed it; through them she has improved her living conditions.

loans.use: to pay off the credit cards she has with Banco de América Central (Bac)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials..

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en: Being a responsible mother, Loreta helps her husband generate income. She is now 40 years old and has two school-age children. Loreta owns and manages a small variety store while her husband cultivates their farmland. She plans to improve more of her business in order to earn a higher income. But due to a shortage of capital, she is requesting a loan of PHP10,000. She will use this loan to buy more stocks of canned goods, seasonings, noodles, snack foods, beverages and seasonings to sell. Through patience and hard work, she will make her business profitable in the future.

loans.use: to buy more canned goods, seasonings, noodles, snack foods, beverages and seasonings to sell

location.town: Brgy. Munguia, Dupax del Norte,Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en:
Luzviminda previously accessed a 35,000 PHP loan that she used to purchase more quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business. Her earnings were a big help in her personal, household and business expenditures. 

She would like to apply for another 40,000 PHP loan to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other products to add to her current inventory. The more items displayed at the store, the better. More items to sell will result in a better profit. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Luzviminda hopes that her business will continue to flourish and dreams of having a better living. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of their work every week and draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay their micro-finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as: perlins, zinc and freight.

loans.name: Kaneez

texts.en:
Kaneez is a 35-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan with her family. Her husband has been successfully running a small general store at the corner of his house for many years. He also assists his younger brother by purchasing a stock of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts over the years. Kaneez is a mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing, and health expenses. For this reason, she expects her husband to grow his business and ultimately increase his income.

Kaneez requested a loan from Kiva's field partner's BRAC Pakistan so that her husband can buy more stock of rice, sugar, cooking oil, detergent, soap and biscuits. She is an honest and regular client of BRAC Pakistan. She repeated her loan cycle with a good repayment history. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding the business further in the future. She is very thankful to Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy more products to sell in her husband's general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase curls, biscuits, condiments and beverages to sell

loans.name: Verónica Hilaria

texts.es: La señora verónica es una mujer visionaria preocupada por el desarrollo de su familia y de los niños a los que le brinda el pan de la enseñanza, ya que ella es maestra de educación primaria con 29 años de ejercer dicha profesión, es casada con 2 hijos a los que le está brindando todo el apoyo , actualmente está presentando  unas necesidades que solo con ayuda del financiamiento oportuno puede resolver, por eso visito la oficina de ceprodel para ser beneficiada y lo utilizaría en el pago de matrícula de estudios  universitarios de sus 2 hijos  y de esa manera mejorar sus condiciones y nivel de vida, agradeciéndole a ceprodel por la oportunidad de lograr su sueño.
texts.en: Verónica is a visionary woman concerned for her family's well-being and that of her children whom she supports through education, as she has been an elementary school teacher for 29 years. She is married, has 2 children to whom she gives all her support, and today is supporting them with the financing help that only this loan can provide. Therefore she visited Ceprodel's office to seek a loan to use to pay for the university tuition for her two children and in this way improve their station in life and quality of life. She is thankful to Ceprodel for the opportunity to achieve this dream.

loans.use: to pay university tuition, transportation, food, monthly payments for her children.

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en:
Rukhsana is 45-year-old woman residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of three sons and two daughters. 

Her husband has been running a tailoring shop for nine years,  and he is the only one who is responsible for the household expenses. Rukhsana has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan, because her husband wants to purchase pieces of cloth, thread, cotton paper, ribbons, needles, etc for his business purposes.

This loan will enable her husband to purchase the above items for business use; it will also be fruitful for Rukhsana, since she wants to save a certain amount to fulfill her family's needs. 

Rukhsana is very happy after getting the loan from Kiva partner Brac Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy sewing related items like cloth, thread, cotton paper, a sewing machine etc.

loans.name: Pedro José

texts.es:
El señor Pedro se dedica a laborar como subdirector de un  centro de educación don vive  con 13 años  de laborar,  y tiene una relación  estable  donde han procreado tres hijos a los que les brinda todo su apoyo para su desarrollo.
Actualmente  tiene 5 créditos recibidos los que le han ayudado a lograr sus sueños y suplir sus necesidades en el momento en lo que más lo necesita.
El acude a Ceprodel porque requiere solicitar un crédito para la construcción  de un cuarto,  Esto con el fin de mejorar las condiciones de vida y lo utilizara en la compra de materiales de construcción tales como: bloque huecos, ladrillos, arena, cemento, piedrín, hierro, perlines y pago de mano de obra
texts.en:
Pedro has worked for 13 years as an assistant manager in an education centre where he lives. He is in a stable relationship and gives all his support to the development of their three children.

Currently he has taken out 5 loans, which have helped him to reach his dreams and make up for his hardships in the moments he needed them most.

He has come to Ceprodel because he needs to ask for a loan in order to build a room. The aim is to improve their living conditions. He will use it to buy construction materials such as hollow blocks, bricks, sand, cement, gravel, iron, perlin plates and payment for manual labor.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as bricks and cement.

loans.name: Juana Marizol

texts.es:
Marizol es una joven señora emprendedora con mucho entusiasmo por la superación profesional tanto personal como familiar, es casada con 2 hijos a su cargo a los que apoya en su desarrollo académico, trabaja en un ministerio de educación en la zona donde vive con 10 años de laborar desempeñándose como responsable de recursos humanos.
Esta señora visito a ceprodel para solicitar  financiamiento para utilizarlo en   Pago de titulo de licenciatura en educación primaria y gastos universitarios de la hija Unan León, los que le vendrían a mejorar las condiciones de vida familiar.
texts.en:
Marizol is a young enterprising woman with a great enthusiasm to succeed professionally and personally as a family member.  She is married, has two children who she supports in their academic development.  She works for the ministry of education and has been working in human resources for 10 years.

This lady visited CEPRODEL to request a loan to pay for a master’s degree in primary education and for her daughter’s, Unan Leon, university expenses.  This will bring better family life’s conditions.

loans.use: to pay tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials.

loans.name: Dimas Eduardo

texts.es: Dimas en un joven visionario en busca de darme mejores condiciones a su familia, el trabaja en la alcaldía de la localidad donde vive,  como administrador en la estación policial de la misma zona, también tiene una pequeña granja de crianza y desarrollo de cerdos el cual quiere fortalecer con financiamiento atravez de ceprodel, es casado con una niña pequeña a su cargo la que goza de todo el apoyo como todo un buen padre, con ese objetivo se presento a la oficina  para ser beneficiado y utilizarlo en la Compra de cerdos de desarrollo, concentrado de desarrollo y vitaminas, para ser más productiva y mas técnica, para tener mejores condiciones económicas para su familia.
texts.en: Dimas is a young visionary in search of better conditions for his family.  He works at the local city hall, as a manager at the local police station.  He also has a small pig farm which he wants to fund through CEPRODEL.  He is married, has a young daughter to whom he provides all his support like a good father.  He is asking for a loan to buy pigs to raise, feed, and vitamins so that his production will be greater and he can provide better financial conditions to his family.

loans.use: to buy pigs, feed, and vitamins.

loans.name: María Del Rosario

texts.es:
María es una señora ejemplar , preocupada por la enseñanza de los demás principalmente por los niños, actualmente se desempeña como Directora de un centro de educación primaria en la zona donde vive con 27 años de laborar para el ministerio de educación , es casada con un hijo   a su cargo, el cual está apoyando en sus estudios universitario, 
Esta señora se presento a ceprodel para solicitar financiamiento el que utilizara en la compra de una computadora la que usara su hijo creándole mejores condiciones para el desarrollo profesional.
texts.en:
Maria is an exemplary woman, preoccupied with teaching children and now works as a principal at an elementary education center.  She has been working for the Ministry of Education for 27 years, is married and has a son whom she supports with his university education.

This woman approached CEPRODEL to request a loan to buy a computer that her son will use, creating better conditions for his professional development.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Blanca Mercedes

texts.es: Blanca   es  conserje en un centro de salud en el municipio, con 10 años de ejercer  dicha actividad, es madre soltera, con un hijo a su cargo. Actualmente tiene la necesidad de seguir mejorando su vivienda a través de la construcción de las paredes de su vivienda, ya que actualmente está cerrada de plástico y no tiene seguridad en dicha vivienda, la que con mucho sacrificio ha venido construyendo, por eso visito la oficina de ceprodel para solicitar un financiamiento el que lo utilizaría en Compra de materiales de construcción: ladrillos, cemento, arena, piedrín y pago de mano de obra.  y de esta manera mejorar sus condiciones de vida
texts.en:
Blanca has worked as a caretaker at a municipal health centre for the last ten years. She is a single mother, caring for one child.

Currently she needs to continue improving her house by building the walls. At present, the walls are made from plastic and she doesn’t have security in her house. With much sacrifice, she has been building them. This is why she visited the CEPRODEL office to ask for a loan, which she will use to buy construction materials such as: bricks, cement, sand, gravel and payment for the manual labor. In this way, she will improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as bricks and cement.

loans.name: Musarat's Group

texts.en:
Musarat is a 30-year-old, hardworking housewife. She is the mother of five children. 

Her son has taken over the vegetable shop from her husband because her son is older now and does not have any occupation to earn money. Her husband started to drive a van so that both can contribute to the household expenses.  

Musarat is taking a loan out for both of them. She will pay a portion to her son, so he can buy a stock of vegetables, and a portion to her husband, so he can buy new tires for the van. She hopes that this loan will prove productive for both businesses and that she can increase her savings. 

She is feeling relaxed and happy after taking this loan.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for her son's vegetable shop and to purchase tires for her husband's van.

loans.name: Djiguitougou Group

texts.fr:
Djiguitougou est un regroupement de femmes de Medina coura qui se connaissent bien et qui  vivent dans de grandes familles traditionnelles avec leurs maris, enfants et autres parents. Elles ont en moyenne 34ans, sont mariées et ont au moins 4 enfants.
Ce groupe de femmes fait le commerce d’articles divers tels que, Condiments, Pagnes, Savon, Légume, jus et divers. Pour augmenter la taille de leurs activités, les membres ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur quinzième prêt de groupe. 
Kadia  qui est un membre du groupe Djiguitougou debout en 2 eme position de la gauche vers la droite, est une vendeuse de pièces de pagnes. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter dix pièces de pagnes. Elle se procure de ces pagnes  à  Koutiala. Elle les vend au comptant à la maison et au marché à une clientèle diverse. 
Tandis que les autres membres du groupe Benkadi comptent réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 100 000CFA  chacune au  cours de ce cycle Mme Kadia compte réaliser  130 000FCFA.  
En plus du remboursement des prêts, elles utilisent une partie du revenu  pour faire face aux dépenses personnelles et augmenter son fonds de commerce.
texts.en:
Djiguitougou is a group of women from Medina coura who know each other well. They live in traditional extended families with their husbands, children and other family members. On the average, they are 34 years old, married, with at least four children.
The group members sell various products such as condiments, traditional "pagnes" fabric, soap, vegetable, juice and miscellaneous articles. In order to expand their business volume, the group members have decided to join  the Soro Yiriwaso loan program. They are on their 15th group loan.
Kadia, a member of the Djiguitougou group, is the second one standing from left to right in the photo. She sells traditional colorful "pagnes" fabric. She plans to use her loan to buy 10 sets of pagnes. She stocks up in Koutiala. She sells for cash out of her home and at the market to a diverse clientele. While other members of the Benkadi group plan to earn an average revenue of 100,000 West African francs during this loan cycle, Mrs. Kadia plans to earn 130,000 francs. In addition to repaying their loan, the group members will use part of the revenues for personal expenses and add the rest to their working capital.

loans.use: to buy traditional fabric.

loans.name: Ana Patricia

texts.es:
La señora Ana se dedica a laborar como maestra en una comunidad donde habita  atendiendo niños de varias edades y cuya preocupación principal es la educación en estas personas ya que son el futuro de la nación.
Ella acude a Ceprodel porque requiere solicitar un crédito para el mejoramiento de su vivienda el que lo utilizara en la compra de materiales de  construcción tales como: Bloques, cemento, arena, hierro, puertas, piedrín, hierro liso y pago de mano de obra.   Cabe señalar que Ceprodel se ha caracterizado por apoyar a estos maestros que sin duda contribuyen al desarrollo de los pequeños, y por ende al desarrollo de la familia, en su caso, mejora las condiciones y nivel de vida efectuando las mejoras en su vivienda, y con este crédito ya son 12 financiamientos y de esa manera ha venido creando mejores condiciones en su familia, agradeciéndole a  ceprodel por darle la oportunidad de ser beneficiada y lograr subsanar la necesidad prioritaria de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Ana works as a teacher in the community where she lives, teaching children of various ages. Her greatest concern is the education of these people, as they are the future of the nation.

She came to CEPRODEL because she needed to ask for a loan to improve her house. She will use the loan to buy construction materials such as blocks, cement, sand, iron, doors, perlin plates, flat iron and payment for the manual labor.

She points out that CEPRODEL is characterized by its support of teachers, which without a doubt has contributed to the development of children, and therefore the development of families. In her case, it has improved the conditions and standard of living in her house, with this loan she has already had 12 funding cycles, and in this way she has created better conditions for her family.

She is thankful to CEPRODEL for giving her the opportunity to be a beneficiary and helping her prioritize the necessity of repairing her house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Asel

texts.ru: Асел 28лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Асел - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Асел занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Асел, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 1 лошадь, также имеет небольшой земельный надел мерою 0,53 ГА, на котором в основном сеет пшеницу и ячмень, сажает картофель. Ежемесячный доход составляет 11,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Асел обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку бычков для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Асел планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку семейной автомашины.
texts.en: Asel is 28 years old and married. She and her husband are bringing up two children. Asel has received secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, Asel raises livestock and grows produce, having launched this business 10 years ago by buying livestock for 5,000 KGS. Thanks to Asel's hard work, her farm now includes two dairy cows and one horse. She also has a small land plot, 0.53 ha [1.3 acres] in size, where she mainly grows wheat, barley and potatoes. Her monthly income is 11,000 KGS. In order to develop her farm further, Asel has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan to increase her livestock headcount by buying bull calves. Asel plans to use her resulting revenues for an additional increase of livestock. She also plans to save up to buy a car for her family.

loans.use: to buy steers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a motorized canoe.

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор искусная швея, проживающая со своей семьей в Б.Гафуровском районе города Худжанд. У нее есть муж и ребенок в возрасте 1,5 лет. Ее муж предоставляет услуги мастера по ремонту домов. Гулбахор тоже наравне мужа зарабатывает на жизнь. Она по натуре проворная, шустрая и предприимчивая женщина. Пять лет назад Гулбахор открыла собственный бизнес. Она у себя дома шьет разные женские национальные платья и затем выводит на рынок на продажу. На ее платья всегда имеется спрос, так как они отличаются от рыночных по качеству и красоте. Чтобы продолжить деятельность Гулбахор необходимо закупить партию тканей. Для этой цели она просит кредит и надеется, что ее поддержат.
texts.en: Gulbahor is a clever seamstress who lives with her family in the B. Gafurovsky area in the city of Khujand.  She has a husband and a 1.5 year old child.  Her husband provides home repair services.  Gulbahor earns a living on par with her husband.  By nature she is an agile, nimble and resourceful woman.  Five years ago Gulbahor opened her own business.  She sews different traditional dresses in her home and then brings them to the market to sell.  Her dresses are always in demand as they are better in quality and beauty than the ones at the market.  In order to continue her business Gulbahor needs to purchase fabric.  With this goal in mind she is asking for a loan and hopes that you will support her.

loans.use: to buy fabric to sew women's dresses for sale

loans.name: Annia

texts.es:
Annia, tiene la edad  de 38 años, está casada, vive con su esposo el cual es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de preparación del terreno para la siembra de los árboles de mamón chino, además de comprar los 
árboles injertados de buena calidad. Con esta nueva plantación cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Annia, 38 years old, is married and lives with her husband, who is her top priority. With her loan, she plans to buy fertilizer, fungicide and to pay for manual labor to prepare a plot of land to plant mamón trees [a type of fruit, similar to a lychee]. She will also buy good quality tree grafts.

With the crop from this new plantation she hopes to have better earnings and thereby improve the living conditions of her family, and also invest a bit more in the area of crops and also achieve various goals.

This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She hadn’t had a loan before from a state bank, but FUDECOSUR offers loans with greater ease of use and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to plant mamón.

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en: Shehnaz is a 42-year-old woman. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of four sons and one daughter. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. He has been running an auto rickshaw for the last six years, but for the past many days his rickshaw has not been working properly because of regular usage. He feels that most of its parts are out of order. So he is unable to generate any amount of income. He wants to buy a new auto rickshaw. However, due to a lack of money he finds it difficult to cover the cost of a new rickshaw. Therefore, Shehnaz has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of a new rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Shehnaz is so thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw.

loans.name: Aurea

texts.en: Aurea owns and cultivates her rice farming business. She is 41 years of age and has operated this small field with her husband for more than 10 years. Aurea is thankful that her husband is supportive in making their rice farming productive. With her aim to succeed both in business and life, she is seeking additional capital of PHP 10,000. She will use this loan to buy four bags of fertilizers and insecticides to improve the growth of her crops. In this way, she could gain a bigger income and provide her family a comfortable lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy four bags of fertilizers and insecticides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Anvarjon

texts.ru:
Этого молодого мужчину зовут Анварчон. Ему 24 года. Анварчон живет с родителями в городке Худжанд. Анварчон имеет маленький магазин, где продает сантехнику. В сфере торговли он работает уже 6 лет. Анварчон начитает продвигать вперед свой малый бизнес. 
  Анварчон хочет купить машину марки "Opel" Караван для перевозки товара. Таким способом он уменьшит транспортные затраты. Но ему не хватает денег, чтобы купит машину, по этой причине просит кредит. Помогите ему собрать $2000 для приобретения машины. Он нуждается в Вашей поддержке.
texts.en:
This is Anvarjon, a young man who lives with his parents in the city of Khujand.  He is 24 years old and owns a small shop where he sells plumbing parts.  He has been working in this field for the past six years and is trying to develop his small business.

Anvarjon wants to buy an Opel "Caravan" to transport his merchandise and reduce transportation costs.  However, he doesn't have enough money to buy a car, so he is taking a loan.  Will you please help him to borrow $2,000 to buy a car?  Anvarjon needs your support.

loans.use: to buy a car (an Opel "Caravan")

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es: Maritza, tiene la edad  de 52 años, está casada, vive con su esposo y sus hijos  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes foliares, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de moras en las condiciones del suelo y así poder evitar que con la lluvias se erosione los suelos y dar asistencia para el café, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Maritza is 52 years old, married and lives with her husband and children, who are her biggest priority. With her loan she intends to buy foliar fertilizers and fungicides. She will also pay for labor to work on soil quality and thus prevent rain erosion, to support the coffee plants, as well as to take advantage of the good soil fertility, climate and other characteristics that favor the cultivation of coffee. With these improvements in cultivation she hopes to earn a little profit and thus improve her family's quality of life, as well as invest a bit more in her cultivated lands and achieve some of her goals. 

This is the first loan she is receiving from FUDECOSUR. She did not previously have other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her a loan with greater ease and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: Asistencia de café

loans.name: Batmagul

texts.ru: Батмагул 48 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. Муж-плотник, а также предоставляет услуги на своем собственном тракторе односельчанам. Двое старших сыновей находятся на заработках в России. У Батмагул - средне-специальное образование, окончила автодорожный техникум, по специальности бухгалтер. После окончания техникума в 1984 году работала бухгалтером государственной страховой компании. На данный момент домохозяйка, вместе со своей семьей занимается сельским хозяйством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Батмагул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 лошади, 3 теленка, 20 овец, 6 коз, 30 кур. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Батмагул обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Батмагул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку дома для среднего сына.
texts.en:
Batmagul is 48 years old and married.  She and her husband are raising five children.  Her husband is a carpenter and he also performs services with his tractor for people in their village.  Their two eldest children work abroad in Russia.  Batmagul graduated from a road and transport technical college with a degree in accounting.  After graduating from college in 1984, she started working in a state insurance company.  She is now a homemaker and she and her family work in the animal husbandry business that she started 20 years ago with the purchase of 10,000 som (KGS) worth of cattle.

As a result of her hard work, today Batmagul has four horses, three calves, 20 sheep, six goats, and 30 chickens.  Her monthly income amounts to 15,000 som (KGS).  With an aim to further developing her business, Batmagul applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan to buy cows.  Batmagul plans to invest the profits from her loan in further increasing the size of her herd.  She also plans to save up money to buy a home for her middle son.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Abida

texts.en:
Abida is a 25-years old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns a bookstore and earns sufficient income from this business. Her husband’s bookstore situated near by a school. This is the reason his sales are very good and earnings as well.
